definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: One of our promising young officers has begun his training in the Spartan Agoge.
sentences.chinese: 我們有前途的年輕軍官，他一開始在斯巴達教育培訓。

sentences.english: His book The End of Sparta will appear in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 他執筆的《斯巴達的末日》一書將於2011年出版。

sentences.english: Itwas used in 1961 during the flight ofastronauntastronaut Alan Shepard.
sentences.chinese: 在1961年航天員阿郎斯巴達曾使用過。

sentences.english: Lansdorp also mentioned that he'd visited Spartak last year to teach a clinic.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特還提到他去年參觀過斯巴達克，並在那裏講學。

sentences.english: And when Sparta burns, you shall bathe in gold.
sentences.chinese: 當斯巴達被火燒的時候，你們講沐浴在黃金裏。

sentences.english: And by Spartan law, we will stand and fight. And die.
sentences.chinese: 根據斯巴達法典，我們將直起腰身，戰鬥直至死去。

sentences.english: Menelaus forgave her and brought her back to Sparta.
sentences.chinese: 曼紐拉斯原諒了她並把她帶回斯巴達。

sentences.english: The Spartans withdrew their garrison from the Athenian Acropolis, and democracy was restored.
sentences.chinese: 斯巴達人從雅典衛城撤回駐軍，民主得以恢復。

sentences.english: Do not be coy or stupid, Persian. You can afford neither in Sparta. (Queen)
sentences.chinese: 別天真了，波斯人，在斯巴達你一樣都供不起。

sentences.english: The Spartans sprayed the Elites and the Hunters, who turtled behind their shields.
sentences.chinese: 斯巴達們向躲在護盾後的精英和獵人猛烈掃射。

sentences.english: Her stepfather married her to Menelaus, king of Sparta.
sentences.chinese: 海倫的繼父將她嫁給了斯巴達的國王墨涅勞斯。

sentences.english: A token of Sparta's submission to the will of Xerxes.
sentences.chinese: 作爲斯巴達臣服雨薛西斯意志的象徵。

sentences.english: The Spartan King Leonidas led the army to the pass at Thermopylae.
sentences.chinese: 斯巴達國王里奧尼達斯率領軍隊前往塞莫皮萊隘口。

sentences.english: May I give the floor now to the wife of Leonidas and queen of Sparta.
sentences.chinese: 下面讓列奧尼達斯的妻子斯巴達的女王來講話。

sentences.english: Afterward the Sparta king and the Elis king has signed " the sacred armistice month " the treaty.
sentences.chinese: 後來斯巴達王和伊利斯王簽訂了“神聖休戰月”條約。

sentences.english: The impact lifted the Spartan a half meter off the ground, and he landed in a heap.
sentences.chinese: 撞擊使斯巴達飛起半米高掉在地上，他摔作一團。

definition: formation (of a sports team, troops etc)
to mess sth up/to screw up
to make a comeback/(of a doctor's assessment of the gender of a fetus) to turn out to be wrong
to deal the fatal blow (sports, chess etc)/to score the winning point
barbarian/slave servant/(old) contemptuous term for people from southern China (used by northern Chinese people)
to charge and break through enemy lines
